title: Need a Type ID on Photographers Logo
content:
Hey,  
I need to find out what font is used for this photographers logo and body in order to try and make it look nicer for him (or show him it's no good).

The 'r' is pretty distinctive, but can't ID it.  
Any ideas? I'm stumped.

More examples of it in use on his website: [www.alexhowe.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106073048/http:/www.alexhowe.com/ "www.alexhowe.com")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106073048/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_159.png) | 11.27 KB |
author: JordanSheldrick
